radiographic_examinations.findings: A 5Â·7 cm mass in the posterior wall of the rectosigmoid, with perirectal fat infiltration and involvement of lymph nodes. Narrowing of the rectosigmoid lumen was seen, but the tumour seemed to be growing by extension into the perirectal fat rather than into the intestinal lumen.
Confirmed MRI findings of mass lesion and infiltration.
